sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Sync new seeded data for upgrade customers from Seeded Base project configuration to team space configuration.</description>
        <name>Sync Seeded data on TSpace for Upgrade</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[syncSeededDataForUpgrade();

function isRecordExists(recordName) {
	var tableUtils = new TableUtils(recordName);
	if(tableUtils.tableExists()){
	var gr = new GlideRecord(recordName);
	gr.query();
	if(gr.getRowCount()>0)
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

function syncSeededDataForUpgrade(){
	var isTSP1_Active = this.isRecordExists('tsp1_project');
	var isTSP2_Active = this.isRecordExists('tsp2_project');
	var isTSP3_Active = this.isRecordExists('tsp3_project');
	var isTSP4_Active = this.isRecordExists('tsp4_project');
	var isTSP5_Active = this.isRecordExists('tsp5_project');
	
	if(isTSP1_Active){
		(new TeamspaceConsoleSeededDataSync()).process('tsp1_project');
	}
	
	if(isTSP2_Active){
		(new TeamspaceConsoleSeededDataSync()).process('tsp2_project');
	}
	
	if(isTSP3_Active){
		(new TeamspaceConsoleSeededDataSync()).process('tsp3_project');
	}
	
	if(isTSP4_Active){
		(new TeamspaceConsoleSeededDataSync()).process('tsp4_project');
	}
	
	if(isTSP5_Active){
		(new TeamspaceConsoleSeededDataSync()).process('tsp5_project');
	}
	
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-03-30 06:16:36</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5f39aa5f87c5130049e94c2c59cb0b0e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Sync Seeded data on TSpace for Upgrade</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Planned Task_v2" source="com.snc.planned_task_v2">92ef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43f1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_5f39aa5f87c5130049e94c2c59cb0b0e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-03-31 10:51:09</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Sync Seeded data on TSpace for Upgrade
